thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel near to the tower bridge
thread.title_full: Hotel near to the tower bridge - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kaibanez
title: Hotel near to the tower bridge
text:
We like the Premier Inn London City Aldgate Hotel very much. It's near located to the Tower Bridge. The room was clean and the bed is very comfortable. The Breakfast was good and we have nice talks to the staff.
It's was a nice stay and it wasn't expensive for this hotel in this location. At our next trips to London City, we prefer to stay at this hotel
